message.content: I need to update the TODO.md to mark the PUT endpoint and frontend edit functionality as completed.

function.arguments:
{"command": "str_replace", "path": "/workspace/SheepVibes/TODO.md", "old_str": "
*   [x] **Feed Management (Backend API):**
    *   [x] `POST /api/feeds`: Add a new feed (URL, optionally associate with a tab). Backend should fetch initial data upon adding.
    *   [x] `DELETE /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Remove a feed.
    *   [ ] `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Update feed properties (e.g., move to different tab - maybe later).
*   [x] **Feed Management (Frontend UI):**
    *   [x] Add a "+" button or form to input a feed URL.
    *   [x] Implement JS to call the `POST /api/feeds` endpoint.
    *   [x] Add a "close" (X) button to each feed widget.
    *   [x] Implement JS for the close button to call `DELETE /api/feeds/<feed_id>` and remove the widget from the DOM.
", "new_str": "
*   [x] **Feed Management (Backend API):**
    *   [x] `POST /api/feeds`: Add a new feed (URL, optionally associate with a tab). Backend should fetch initial data upon adding.
    *   [x] `DELETE /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Remove a feed.
    *   [x] `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Update feed URL and properties.
*   [x] **Feed Management (Frontend UI):**
    *   [x] Add a "+" button or form to input a feed URL.
    *   [x] Implement JS to call the `POST /api/feeds` endpoint.
    *   [x] Add a "close" (X) button to each feed widget.
    *   [x] Implement JS for the close button to call `DELETE /api/feeds/<feed_id>` and remove the widget from the DOM.
    *   [x] Add an edit (✎) button to each feed widget.
    *   [x] Implement JS for the edit button to call `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>` and update the feed URL.
", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: str_replace_editor

content:
The file /workspace/SheepVibes/TODO.md has been edited. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of /workspace/SheepVibes/TODO.md:
    49	    *   [x] Handle switching between tabs (fetch and render feeds for the selected tab).
    50	
    51	## Phase 3: Interactivity & Core Features
    52	
    53	*   [x] **Feed Management (Backend API):**
    54	    *   [x] `POST /api/feeds`: Add a new feed (URL, optionally associate with a tab). Backend should fetch initial data upon adding.
    55	    *   [x] `DELETE /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Remove a feed.
    56	    *   [x] `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Update feed URL and properties.
    57	*   [x] **Feed Management (Frontend UI):**
    58	    *   [x] Add a "+" button or form to input a feed URL.
    59	    *   [x] Implement JS to call the `POST /api/feeds` endpoint.
    60	    *   [x] Add a "close" (X) button to each feed widget.
    61	    *   [x] Implement JS for the close button to call `DELETE /api/feeds/<feed_id>` and remove the widget from the DOM.
    62	    *   [x] Add an edit (✎) button to each feed widget.
    63	    *   [x] Implement JS for the edit button to call `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>` and update the feed URL.
    64	*   [x] **Tab Management (Backend API):**
    65	    *   [x] `POST /api/tabs`: Create a new tab.
    66	    *   [x] `DELETE /api/tabs/<tab_id>`: Delete a tab (handle associated feeds - delete them or move to default?).
    67	    *   [x] `PUT /api/tabs/<tab_id>`: Rename a tab.
    68	*   [x] **Tab Management (Frontend UI):**
    69	
Review the changes and make sure they are as expected. Edit the file again if necessary.

    *   [x] `POST /api/feeds`: Add a new feed (URL, optionally associate with a tab). Backend should fetch initial data upon adding.
    *   [x] `DELETE /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Remove a feed.
    *   [ ] `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Update feed properties (e.g., move to different tab - maybe later).
*   [x] **Feed Management (Frontend UI):**
    *   [x] Add a "+" button or form to input a feed URL.
    *   [x] Implement JS to call the `POST /api/feeds` endpoint.
    *   [x] Add a "close" (X) button to each feed widget.
    *   [x] Implement JS for the close button to call `DELETE /api/feeds/<feed_id>` and remove the widget from the DOM.
extras.new_content:
*   [x] **Feed Management (Backend API):**
    *   [x] `POST /api/feeds`: Add a new feed (URL, optionally associate with a tab). Backend should fetch initial data upon adding.
    *   [x] `DELETE /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Remove a feed.
    *   [x] `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Update feed URL and properties.
*   [x] **Feed Management (Frontend UI):**
    *   [x] Add a "+" button or form to input a feed URL.
    *   [x] Implement JS to call the `POST /api/feeds` endpoint.
    *   [x] Add a "close" (X) button to each feed widget.
    *   [x] Implement JS for the close button to call `DELETE /api/feeds/<feed_id>` and remove the widget from the DOM.
    *   [x] Add an edit (✎) button to each feed widget.
    *   [x] Implement JS for the edit button to call `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>` and update the feed URL.

-    *   [ ] `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>`: Update feed properties (e.g., move to different tab - maybe later).
